result.reason: Implemented variable expansion for the hostname field to support dynamic connection names like %name% using a new ConnectionInfoVariableExpander.
result.approach: Created a new ConnectionInfoVariableExpander class to handle variable substitution, and modified the ConnectionInfo.Hostname getter to utilize this expander.
